class  TimeConverter
 TimeConverter has all the time conversion and snapping functionality that used to live in TimeTextCtrl. The idea is to have a GUI-less class which can do the conversions, so that we can use it in sanpping without having a window created each time. More...
class  TimeTextCtrl
 TimeTextCtrl provides the advanced time formatting control used in the status bar of Audacity. More...
